channel.title: Need a hoster for my server!Look if you can host using no-ip!
channel.description: I need a hoster for my evilscape server...if you host you will be a co-owner...=-]...and maybe help me code a bit and add things...thank you...P.S. you need a fast computer bc my computer is like new but for some odd reason it lags for me...really bad...and my server is like lag free for everyone else and thats y i need a hoster lol

item.title: Need a hoster for my server!Look if you can host using no-ip!
item.dc:creator: @snuffle snuffle
item.description:
@snuffle wrote:

hello i can host this server for 2 months on 24/7 dedi cause i can get free dedi server hope u reply and hope i get to host your server get back to me before i host someone elses instead post here

Read full topic
